translation.Name: Buak_Note_21
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: We finally did it. We dropped the ball hard enough that the other chairmen have decided to unanimously consider the bioweapon contracts due to how many times we’ve accidentally made them. I really thought they were joking, but I was wrong. They said it’s for “funding future endeavours” and that “they will never be used”, but having things like that isn’t a good idea in the first place. I suppose once our research is complete it won’t even matter- but what if we aren’t fast enough? I’ll have to think up something soon, and delay it for as long as I can.
